titleStmt.title: Remarks upon a tract, intituled A treatise of humane reason, and upon Mr. Warren's late defence of it. / By Sir George Blundell.
titleStmt.author: Blundell, George, Sir.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jacob Tonson, at the Judges Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
